Class SplashScreen

extends java.lang.Object
    A base for all splash screens.
    Author:
    wessles, Jeviny

    • Constructor Detail

      • SplashScreen

        public SplashScreen(Texture splashTexture,
                    long showTimeMillis,
                    boolean fitToScreen)
        Parameters:
        splashTexture - The texture of the splash screen.
        showTimeMillis - The time that the splash screen is shown.
        fitToScreen - Whether or not to fit the image to the screen while still maintaining the aspect ratio.

        Show some love for Mercury by using a shiny Mercury splash screen!

      • show

        public boolean show(Graphics g)
        Shows the splash screen on screen, whilst checking if it is time to stop as well.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the splash is done.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
